Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsstoplight; cheateau and front street: hovering light about two miles away, near the missouri river at the cheateau bridge. i thought it was a police helicopter because it just stayed there, maybe 10 or so seconds. my wife looked. the light looked like a police helicopter spotlight, except extremely bright. the light took a slight curving motion and then absolutely went warp drive following the missouri river, gone in maybe 1\10th of a second. i know what i saw, my wife thinks she saw it. that's all i have.
